name: Hl7VSAlternateCharacterSetHandlingScheme
title: hl7VS-alternateCharacterSetHandlingScheme
description: Concepts that specify the scheme used when any alternative character sets are specified in the second or later iterations of MSH-18 Character Set, and if any special handling scheme is needed.
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

contains.display: This standard is titled "Information Technology - Character Code Structure and Extension Technique". .
The character set switching mode specified in HL7 2.5, section 2.7.2 and section 2.A.46, "XPN - extended person name".
This is the default, indicating that there is no character set switching occurring in this message.
